quiz.question: What is Photon Engine primarily used for in game development?
quiz.hint: It is a solution for networking in games.

quiz.question: Which of the following platforms is NOT supported by Photon Engine for game development?
quiz.hint: Photon Engine supports game engines, not 3D modeling software.

quiz.question: What type of games is Photon Engine best suited for?
quiz.hint: Photon Engine excels in networking for games played simultaneously by multiple players.

quiz.question: Which feature of Photon Engine helps developers synchronize game state across different clients?
quiz.hint: This feature ensures that all players see the same game state.

quiz.question: What is one advantage of using Photon Engine as a third-party networking solution?
options: It is free for unlimited players
quiz.hint: Photon Engine provides pre-built networking tools.

preferred_if: User wants a ready-to-use networking solution
